name: Followers Of Disgrace
description:
The followers of disgrace is a graphic adventure video game about a man looking for a very important spiritual truth for himself in a three-door room. Can you find that truth by talking to strange beings behind these doors? Discover it! 

Who participated in the creation of the game are: Thavi4: 

Dariolo7: 

Davidcartoons: 

Tuerka: 

Daniel: 

The game was programmed by Thavi4. Written by Thavi4, Dariolo7 and Davidcartoons. Designed and animated by Dariolo7, Tuerka and Davidcartoons. Musicalized by Daniel.
